com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IPageView

public interface IPageView

A class implements IPageView to indicate that it is a page view object. You can set parameters that define how the page data is rendered to a stream.

The following explains the operations that you can perform on an IPage / IPageView object.

  • Since an IPage object is a page view factory, check if the page view object can be resized. If the page view object can be resized, set the page dimensions.
    IPageView pageViewObj = IpageObj.createView();
    if (pageViewObj  instanceof  IResize) {
    IResize resizeObj = (IResize) pageViewObj;
    resizeObj.setSize(destWidth, destHeight) ;
    }
  • Check if the page view object can be rotated. If the page view object can be rotated, set the angle of rotation.
    if (pageViewObj  instanceof  IRotate) {
    IRotate rotateObj = (IRotate) pageViewObj;
    rotateObj.setRotation(RotAngle) ;
    }
  • Check if the page view object contains subpages. If the page view object contains subpages, one can access the number of subpages in the page. Note: in order to determine how many subpages are contained on the page the first subpage must be rendered. Otherwise, IRenderSubPage methods will not return accurate information.
    if (pageViewObj  instanceof  IRenderSubPage) {
    ByteArrayOutputStream outStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
    pageViewObj.renderToStream(outStream, RenderFormatType.PNG);

    IRenderSubPage subPageObj = (IRenderSubPage) pageViewObj;
    return subPageObj.getSubPageCount() ;
    }
  • Create an output stream where the page is to be rendered.
    outputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
  • Check if the page can be rendered in this output format and call renderToStream.
    if (pageViewObj.supportsRenderFormat(RenderFormatType.SVG))
    pageViewObj.renderToStream(outputStream, RenderFormatType.SVG) ;

Method Summary
 void applyView(IPageView pageView)
          Applies the same render settings held in the pageView object to this page view.
 IPageView copyView()
          Creates another page view for the page object and applies the same render settings held in the current page view to the new view.
 void renderToStream(ByteArrayOutputStream renderStream, RenderFormatType formatType)
          Renders the page to the stream in the render format requested.
 boolean supportsRenderFormat(RenderFormatType formatType)
          Queries if the render format requested is supported by this page view object.
 

Method Detail

applyView

public void applyView(IPageView pageView)
Applies the same render settings held in the pageView object to this page view.

copyView

public IPageView copyView()
Creates another page view for the page object and applies the same render settings held in the current page view to the new view.

Returns:
the new page view object, null if an error has occurred.

renderToStream

public void renderToStream(ByteArrayOutputStream renderStream,
                           RenderFormatType formatType)
                    throws RenderFormatNotSupportedException,
                           MissingRenderStreamException,
                           ViewDirectException
Renders the page to the stream in the render format requested. Uses the render parameters that were set for this page view object while rendering the page data.

RenderFormatNotSupportedException
MissingRenderStreamException
ViewDirectException

supportsRenderFormat

public boolean supportsRenderFormat(RenderFormatType formatType)
Queries if the render format requested is supported by this page view object.
